links.title: AAPL rallies 1.68% closing $3.15 higher
links.description: Highlights Report Sentiment: 66% Bullish Overview AAPL finished Thursday at 191.03 surging $3.15 (1.68%). This is the biggest single day gain in over a month. Today's closing price of 191.03 marks the highest close since June 12th. The bulls were in full control today, moving the market higher throughout the whole session.

links.title: 4 Stocks to Buy As Trade War Noise Creates Opportunity
links.description: The stock market's nemesis recently has been escalating trade war tensions between the U.S. and China. Every time the market has a good day, some wild card emerges in the U.S.-China trade war saga, and that wild card weighs on stocks. Most recently, the wild card was U.S.
